content: I'm pretty sure I got the title right, "Love in the Time of Pride" was a heartwarming romantic comedy I watched at the Outfest Los Angeles LGBTQ+ Film Festival, it was a free screening and I really enjoyed it. Anyway, thanks for the suggestions, I'll definitely check them out. I'm particularly interested in "To All the Boys I've Loved Before" and "Love, Simon", can you tell me more about them?
